entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
